attributes.action: Stop the planned probation centre from being located near three primary schools in Kitts Green, Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The probation centre due to open on 27th March on the Meadway will take in all manner of convicts, including paedophiles and other serious sex offenders.  This is a highly inappropriate location in between three primary schools.  Public consultation has been minimal and many residents feel that they have been left in the dark about this proposal.  Please listen to their concerns.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
